channel.title: Bridging the Gap
channel.itunes:author: Pastor Lloyd Pulley
channel.itunes:subtitle: The daily radio program with Pastor Lloyd Pulley
channel.itunes:summary: Bridging the Gap is the teaching ministry of Calvary Chapel Old Bridge in New Jersey. Pastor Lloyd's teaching of God's truth is practical, encouraging, inspirational, and challenging. He has unique way of explaining God's Word in a transparent manner to help listeners apply it to their daily lives.
channel.description: Bridging the Gap is the teaching ministry of Calvary Chapel Old Bridge in New Jersey.
